advanced.description:
{Advanced Pathfinding}

Advanced Pathfinding reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain by 50%.

basic.description:
{Basic Pathfinding}

Basic Pathfinding reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain by 25%.

expert.description:
{Expert Pathfinding}

Expert Pathfinding reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain by 75%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Archery}

Advanced Archery increases the damage done by range attacking creatures by 25%.

basic.description:
{Basic Archery}

Basic Archery increases the damage done by range attacking creatures by 10%.

expert.description:
{Expert Archery}

Expert Archery increases the damage done by range attacking creatures by 50%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Logistics}

Advanced Logistics increases your hero's movement points over land by 20%.

basic.description:
{Basic Logistics}

Basic Logistics increases your hero's movement points over land by 10%.

expert.description:
{Expert Logistics}

Expert Logistics increases your hero's movement points over land by 30%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Scouting}

Advanced Scouting allows your hero to see 2 squares further into the shroud.

basic.description:
{Basic Scouting}

Basic Scouting allows your hero to see 1 square further into the shroud.

expert.description:
{Expert Scouting}

Expert Scouting allows your hero to see 3 squares further into the shroud.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Diplomacy}

Advanced Diplomacy allows you to negotiate with monsters who are weaker than your group, and reduces the cost of surrendering by 40%.

basic.description:
{Basic Diplomacy}

Basic Diplomacy allows you to negotiate with monsters who are weaker than your group, and reduces the cost of surrendering by 20%.

expert.description:
{Expert Diplomacy}

Expert Diplomacy allows you to negotiate with monsters who are weaker than your group, and reduces the cost of surrendering by 60%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Navigation}

Advanced Navigation doubles your hero's movement points at sea.

basic.description:
{Basic Navigation}

Basic Navigation increases your hero's movement points at sea by 50%.

expert.description:
{Expert Navigation}

Expert Navigation increases your hero's movement points at sea by 150%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Leadership}

Advanced Leadership increases your hero's troops' morale by 2.

basic.description:
{Basic Leadership}

Basic Leadership increases your hero's troops' morale by 1.

expert.description:
{Expert Leadership}

Expert Leadership increases your hero's troops' morale by 3.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Wisdom}

Advanced Wisdom allows your hero to learn fourth level spells.

basic.description:
{Basic Wisdom}

Basic Wisdom allows your hero to learn third level spells.

expert.description:
{Expert Wisdom}

Expert Wisdom allows your hero to learn fifth level spells.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Mysticism}

Advanced Mysticism allows your hero to regenerate 3 spell points per day.

basic.description:
{Basic Mysticism}

Basic Mysticism allows your hero to regenerate 2 spell points per day.

expert.description:
{Expert Mysticism}

Expert Mysticism allows your hero to regenerate 4 spell points per day.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Luck}

Advanced Luck increases your hero's luck by 2.

basic.description:
{Basic Luck}

Basic Luck increases your hero's luck by 1.

expert.description:
{Expert Luck}

Expert Luck increases your hero's luck by 3.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Ballistics}

Advanced Ballistics gives control of the catapult to the hero, allowing two aimed shots with increased damage.

basic.description:
{Basic Ballistics}

Basic Ballistics gives control of the catapult to the hero, allowing aimed shots with increased damage.

expert.description:
{Expert Ballistics}

Expert Ballistics gives control of the catapult to the hero, allowing two aimed shots at maximum damage.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Eagle Eye}

Advanced Eagle Eye gives your hero a 50% chance to learn any spell up to 3rd level used in combat.

basic.description:
{Basic Eagle Eye}

Basic Eagle Eye gives your hero a 40% chance to learn any 1st or 2nd level spell used in combat.

expert.description:
{Expert Eagle Eye}

Expert Eagle Eye gives your hero a 60% chance to learn any spell up to 4th level used in combat.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Necromancy}

Advanced Necromancy allows 20% of the creatures killed in combat to be brought back from the dead as Skeletons.

basic.description:
{Basic Necromancy}

Basic Necromancy allows 10% of the creatures killed in combat to be brought back from the dead as Skeletons.

expert.description:
{Expert Necromancy}

Expert Necromancy allows 30% of the creatures killed in combat to be brought back from the dead as Skeletons.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Estates}

With Estates, a hero contributes 250 gold per day to your cause.

basic.description:
{Basic Estates}

With Eestates, a hero contributes 125 gold per day to your cause.

expert.description:
{Expert Estates}

With Estates, a hero contributes 500 gold per day to your cause.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Fire Magic}

Advanced Fire Magic allows your hero to cast Fire spells at reduced cost and increased effectiveness.

basic.description:
{Basic Fire Magic}

Basic Fire Magic allows your hero to cast Fire spells at reduced cost.

expert.description:
{Expert Fire Magic}

Expert Fire Magic allows your hero to cast Fire spells at reduced cost and maximum effectiveness.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Air Magic}

Advanced Air Magic allows your hero to cast Air spells at reduced cost and increased effectiveness.

basic.description:
{Basic Air Magic}

Basic Air Magic allows your hero to cast Air spells at reduced cost.

expert.description:
{Expert Air Magic}

Expert Air Magic allows your hero to cast Air spells at reduced cost and maximum effectiveness.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Water Magic}

Advanced Water Magic allows your hero to cast Water spells at reduced cost and increased effectiveness.

basic.description:
{Basic Water Magic}

Basic Water Magic allows your hero to cast Water spells at reduced cost.

expert.description:
{Expert Water Magic}

Expert Water Magic allows your hero to cast Water spells at reduced cost and maximum effectiveness.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Earth Magic}

Advanced Earth Magic allows your hero to cast Earth spells at reduced cost and increased effectiveness.

basic.description:
{Basic Earth Magic}

Basic Earth Magic allows your hero to cast Earth spells at reduced cost.

expert.description:
{Expert Earth Magic}

Expert Earth Magic allows your hero to cast Earth spells at reduced cost and maximum effectiveness.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Scholar}

Advanced Scholar allows heroes to teach each other any spell up to 3rd level, effectively trading spells between spell books.

basic.description:
{Basic Scholar}

Basic Scholar allows heroes to teach each other 1st and 2nd level spells, effectively trading spells between spell books.

expert.description:
{Expert Scholar}

Expert Scholar allows heroes to teach each other any spell up to 4th level, effectively trading spells between spell books.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Tactics}

Advanced Tactics allows you to rearrange your troops just before combat, within five hex rows of the commanding hero.

basic.description:
{Basic Tactics}

Basic Tactics allows you to rearrange your troops just before combat, within three hex rows of the commanding hero.

expert.description:
{Expert Tactics}

Expert Tactics allows you to rearrange your troops just before combat, within seven hex rows of the commanding hero.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Artillery}

Advanced Artillery gives control of the ballista to the hero, allowing two shots with a 75% chance to inflict double damage.

basic.description:
{Basic Artillery}

Basic Artillery gives control of the ballista to the hero, allowing two shots with a 50% chance to inflict double damage.

expert.description:
{Expert Artillery}

Expert Artillery gives control of the ballista to the hero, allowing two shots which inflict double damage.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Learning}

Advanced Learning increases a hero's earned experience by 10%.

basic.description:
{Basic Learning}

Basic Learning increases a hero's earned experience by 5%.

expert.description:
{Expert Learning}

Expert Learning increases a hero's earned experience by 15%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Offense}

Advanced Offense increases all hand-to-hand damage inflicted by the hero's troops by 20%.

basic.description:
{Basic Offense}

Basic Offense increases all hand-to-hand damage inflicted by the hero's troops by 10%.

expert.description:
{Expert Offense}

Expert Offense increases all hand-to-hand damage inflicted by the hero's troops by 30%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Armorer}

Advanced Armorer reduces all damage inflicted against the hero's troops by 10%.

basic.description:
{Basic Armorer}

Basic Armorer reduces all damage inflicted against the hero's troops by 5%.

expert.description:
{Expert Armorer}

Expert Armorer reduces all damage inflicted against the hero's troops by 15%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Intelligence}

Advanced Intelligence increases a hero's normal maximum spell points by 50%.

basic.description:
{Basic Intelligence}

Basic Intelligence increases a hero's normal maximum spell points by 25%.

expert.description:
{Expert Intelligence}

Expert Intelligence doubles a hero's normal maximum spell points.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Sorcery}

Advanced Sorcery causes a hero's spells to inflict an additional 10% damage in combat.

basic.description:
{Basic Sorcery}

Basic Sorcery causes a hero's spells to inflict an additional 5% damage in combat.

expert.description:
{Expert Sorcery}

Expert Sorcery causes a hero's spells to inflict an additional 15% damage in combat.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Resistance}

Advanced Resistance endows a hero's troops with 10% magic resistance.

basic.description:
{Basic Resistance}

Basic Resistance endows a hero's troops with 5% magic resistance.

expert.description:
{Expert Resistance}

Expert Resistance endows a hero's troops with 20% magic resistance.

advanced.description:
{Advanced First Aid}

Advanced First Aid gives control of the first aid tent to the hero, healing 75 points of damage to the first unit of the selected stack.

basic.description:
{Basic First Aid}

Basic First Aid gives control of the first aid tent to the hero, healing 50 points of damage to the first unit of the selected stack.

expert.description:
{Expert First Aid}

Expert First Aid gives control of the first aid tent to the hero, healing 100 points of damage to the first unit of the selected stack.
